Title: Establishes the office of census counts and provides for its powers and duties and the New York state census counts commission and provides for its powers and duties; appropriation
Summary: Establishes the office of census counts and provides for its powers and duties and the New York state census counts commission and provides for its powers and duties; establishes the offense of impersonation of a census enumerator; makes an appropriation therefor.
LawCode: Add §§95-d & 95-e, Exec L; add §190.95, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to establishing the office of census counts and providing for its powers and duties and establishing the New York state census counts commission and providing for its powers and duties; to amend the penal law, in relation to establishing the offense of impersonation of a census enumerator; and making an appropriation therefor
